message: Let's start with a reasonable offer, Bob. This gives us both a good share.
Alice, your offer was kind, but favors you too much considering the inflation. Let's be a little closer to even.
Bob, let's be fair. I moved closer to your offer, but the inflation hurts you more than me. This is as low as I can go.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous. We're both losing money by being stubborn.  A 50/50 split is the only fair solution.
